definition: soup/hot or boiling water/decoction of medicinal herbs/water in which sth has been boiled
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: My family is Changping area Xiaotangshan.
sentences.chinese: 我家是昌平區小湯山的。
